attributes.title: A Simple Walk II | Official Trailer
attributes.description:
Premieres September 21st on Rooster Teeth
After 10 years, Chris Demarais and Kerry Shawcross return to New Zealand to retrace their footsteps walking from Hobbiton to Mt. Doom, only this time it'll be bigger, better and they're OLDER. Sounds simple!

attributes.title: A Simple Walk II -  An Unexpected Prequel (01)
attributes.description:
Ten years after proving that you CAN simply walk into Mordor,  Chris and Kerry are back in Middle Earth for an unexpected prequel!  They’re going to walk 160 miles from the set of Hobbiton to the real life Lonely Mountain and then climb an active volcano to recreate Bilbo’s adventure from The Hobbit. However, their guide, Nick, and an evil coworker, Gusdalf, have conspired to make this walk anything but simple.

And after you watch the episode, make sure to check out the companion podcast, A Simple Talk, and get a behind the scenes, unedited account of the group's travels, including how they missed their flight to New Zealand. Available for FIRST members NOW! (https://roosterteeth.supportingcast.fm/request_access)!

attributes.title: A Simple Talk Podcast - We Missed Our Plane?! (101)
attributes.description:
(CAUTION: This is a companion podcast for episode 1 of A SIMPLE WALK II and contains spoilers. If you haven't already, check out the main episode.)

Chris, Kerry, and Nick are back in Middle Earth...and this time they have a podcast! Join us for A Simple Talk, and get a behind the scenes, unedited account of the group's travels, including how they missed their flight to New Zealand. A Simple Talk is up on the FIRST member RSS Feed (https://roosterteeth.supportingcast.fm/request_access)!

attributes.title: A Simple Walk II - Barrel Riding & Lost in the Woods (02)
attributes.description:
It's the end of Day 1 and our Hobbits are completely exhausted. In order to continue on (or sleep), Chris and Kerry must first complete an unexpected task. Our Hobbits could use the rest because tomorrow they must battle blisters, barrels, and big ol' bees if they want to make their goal for the day. Despite learning nothing from their previous journey, the boys venture onto a closed forest trail, hoping to make up some ground and definitely not get lost along the way...

And after you watch the episode, make sure to check out the companion podcast, A Simple Talk, and get a behind the scenes, unedited account of the group's travels, including how they accidentally brought explosives on the plane. Available for FIRST members NOW!

attributes.description:
(CAUTION: This is a companion podcast for episode 2 of A SIMPLE WALK II and contains spoilers. If you haven't already, check out the main episode.)

Chris, Kerry, and Nick are back in Middle Earth...and this time they have a podcast! Join us for A Simple Talk, and get a behind the scenes, unedited account of the group's travels, including how the conversation moments before getting lost in the forest at night.

attributes.title: A Simple Walk II - We Are In Trouble (03)
attributes.description:
Chris, Kerry and Nick are lost without water and cell service in a pitch Black Forest. IF they find their way out, the hobbits must then conquer muscle cramps, orcs, and surprise quests before they reach The Lonely Mountain. 

And after you watch the episode, make sure to check out the companion podcast, A Simple Talk, and get a behind the scenes, unedited account of the group's travels, including how they accidentally brought explosives on the plane. Available for FIRST members NOW!

attributes.title: A Simple Talk - Tent Talk & Monkeys
attributes.description: (CAUTION: This is a companion podcast for episode 3 of A SIMPLE WALK II and contains spoilers. If you haven't already, check out the main episode.)Chris, Kerry, and Nick are back in Middle Earth...and this time they have a podcast! Join us for A Simple Talk, and get a behind the scenes, unedited account of the group's travels, including their first Tent Talk!

attributes.title: A Simple Walk II - 100 Miles in 3 Days (04)
attributes.description:
It's the start of Day 5 and Chris, Kerry and Nick are well rested for once. The group will need all the energy they can muster if they are to walk 100 miles in 3 days. With a storm racing our Hobbits to The Lonely Mountain, the trio must walk further and faster than in previous days...unless there's a shortcut.

And after you watch the episode, make sure to check out the companion podcast, A Simple Talk, and get a behind the scenes, unedited account of the group's travels, including how they accidentally brought explosives on the plane. Available for FIRST members NOW!

attributes.title: A Simple Walk II - The Lonely Mountain
attributes.description:
It's Day 7 and Chris, Kerry and Nick are within sight of the Lonely Mountain. If they are to summit, they must arrive at the base of the mountain by the end of the day. Once they get there, will they even have the strength, stamina or time to beat the storm and reach the top?

And after you watch the episode, make sure to check out the companion podcast, A Simple Talk, and get a behind the scenes, unedited account of the group's travels, including how they accidentally brought explosives on the plane. Available for FIRST members NOW!

attributes.title: A Simple Walk II: Finale Livestream
attributes.description:
Catch the Finale Livestream watchalong event to celebrate the last episode of A Simple Walk II! Our Hobbits, Chris Demarais and Kerry Shawcross, will watch the complete full season of A Simple Walk II. Joining them will be their New Zealand Guide, Nick Newton, as well as special guest Gavin Free.
Hear commentary and behind the scenes insights as the crew recounts their epic journey from the set of Hobbiton to the real world Lonely Mountain. It’s an adventure you won’t want to miss!
